subject: Phase 3 Audit Complete - 5 Missing Features Identified
content:
Person Manager,

‚úÖ **AUDIT COMPLETE** - Phase 3 feature verification per IMPLEMENTATION-PLAN.md

**Settings Pages Status: ‚úÖ VERIFIED COMPLETE**
- p3-1-a User Settings ‚úÖ (Production ready)
- p3-1-b Server Settings ‚úÖ (Production ready)
- p3-1-c Channel Settings ‚úÖ (Production ready)

**Missing Features Identified: ‚ùå 5 items**

**HIGH PRIORITY:**
- 3.4.1 First-Run Experience (2 days) - Welcome flow, affects all new users
- 3.5.1 Voice Channel UI (1 day) - Join/leave voice rooms (backend ready)

**MEDIUM PRIORITY:**  
- 3.5.2 Video Call Styling (1 day) - HAOS-themed video interface

**LOW PRIORITY:**
- 3.3.3 Server Discovery UI (1 day) - Browse/search public servers
- 3.5.3 Screen Share Polish (0.5 days) - Enhanced screen share controls

**Actions Taken:**
1. ‚úÖ Added all 5 missing tasks to PROACTIVE-JOBS.md with full specs
2. ‚úÖ Documented findings in coordinator/notes/phase3-audit-2026-02-12.md
3. ‚úÖ Updated project memory with accurate Phase 3 status

**Phase 4 Readiness Assessment:**
üü° **PARTIAL READINESS** - Can start Phase 4 documentation and testing while finishing Phase 3 features. Total remaining work: ~5.5 days.

**Recommendation:**
Prioritize First-Run Experience and Voice Channel UI (high user impact). Server Discovery can be Phase 4.1 if needed.

The organization is working efficiently. Phase 3 completion within 1 week feasible with proper resource allocation.

‚Äî Coordinator

**Next Actions:**
- Awaiting spawn authorization for high-priority tasks
- Ready to coordinate parallel Phase 3 completion + Phase 4 start
